Message

Colored message blocks, to emphasize part of your page

Variables Yes

Variables #

You can use these variables to customize this component. Simply set one or multiple of these variables before importing Bulma. Learn how.

Name Type Default value Computed value
Name Type Default value Computed value
$message-background-color color $background hsl(0, 0%, 96%)
$message-radius size $radius 4px
$message-header-background-color color $text hsl(0, 0%, 29%)
$message-header-color color $text-invert #fff
$message-header-weight font-weight $weight-bold 700
$message-header-padding size 0.75em 1em
$message-header-radius size $radius 4px
$message-body-border-color color $border hsl(0, 0%, 86%)
$message-body-border-width size 0 0 0 4px
$message-body-color color $text hsl(0, 0%, 29%)
$message-body-padding size 1.25em 1.5em
$message-body-radius size $radius 4px
$message-body-pre-background-color color $white hsl(0, 0%, 100%)
$message-body-pre-code-background-color string transparent
$message-header-body-border-width string 0
